title: The Forest Wild: Poems of Henry David Thoreau
description: Henry David Thoreau stands as one of America’s most influential thinkers. Celebrated as a transcendentalist writer, naturalist, and philosopher, his works—including Walden and “Civil Disobedience”—have impacted literary, environmental, and social ideals globally. Yet his poems reveal an equally profound dimension of his genius.This collection brings together Thoreau’s poetry, from his standalone published works to the verses seamlessly interwoven into Walden and other prose. Enriched with contextual excerpts from his prose, this volume invites readers to experience Thoreau’s sensitivity to nature, his vision of independence, and his contemplation of the earthly and spiritual.Both meditative and inspiring, The Forest Poems of Henry David Thoreau is an essential read for anyone drawn to the beauty and wisdom of a literary icon.
author: Henry David Thoreau
